episodes.title: Cults
episodes.description: SCREENER with timecode.Description: KOVR-TV special report on cults and why people join them.  Includes interviews and discussion of the need to belong, drug and alcohol issues, and escaping abusive relationships. Source: HD scan of the original 16mm film elements by California Revealed.Written on original container and film leader: "KOVR00127 Cults"Copyright: Rights are owned by the Center for Sacramento History (CSH).
